content: Hi there, I have one query - https://localhost:9443/fhir-server/api/v4/Patient?identifier=1032703&_include=Patient:general-practitioner, which can return a bundle for patient and practitioner role, in the practitioner role, it has practitioner and location, I want to return these four together in a bundle, how can I achieve this?

@Steven Wang Hi,
You can try with this ways, using rev chaining and revinclude

<base>/Practitioner?_has:Patient:general-practitioner:identifier=103703&_revinclude=Patient:general-practitioner&_revinclude=PractitionerRole:practitioner
Thanks Hue, so you are based on Practitioner resource, how can I do it based on Patient resource?

@Steven Wang how about

https://localhost:9443/fhir-server/api/v4/Patient?identifier=1032703&_include=Patient:general-practitioner&_revinclude:iterate=PractitionerRole:practitioner

Not much server support iterate inside _revinclude.
So, maybe it won't work
